qas.question: What do the two blocks of Catalan display differences in?
How can you explain differences in the language groups?
What are the two blocks of Catalan?

context: Despite its relative lexical unity, the two dialectal blocks of Catalan (<a3_0>Eastern and Western<a3_0/>) show some differences in <a0_0>word choices<a0_0/>. Any <a4_0>lexical divergence<a4_0/> within any of the two groups can be explained <a1_0>as an archaism<a1_0/>. Also, usually <a2_0>Central Catalan<a2_0/> acts as an innovative element.
